description:
Go to Admin>products and then either Recurring Deposit Products(RD) or Fixed Deposit(FD) products.
Click on 'Create Fixed Deposit product' or 'Create Recurring Deposit product'

After furnishing all the details, There is a field 'Description' which is mandatory. It should not be mandatory.

### How to Submit

Submit a pull request linking to the issue and include the link to the pull request in your submission through the GCI Portal.
name: Mifos - Bug Fix: Description field should be non-mandatory in create RD/FD product
